languages.text: "Да убережет сердца наши от гнилых страстей и слабости духа...", — {n}едва слышно шепчет Арджента, не сводя глаз с отметины на вашей шее.{/n}
"May He guard our hearts against foul passions and weakness of spirit..." {n}Argenta whispers to herself, her eyes locked on the mark on your neck.{/n}

languages.text: «Que Él proteja nuestros corazones de las pasiones abyectas y la debilidad de espíritu...». {n}Argenta susurra para sus adentros con la mirada fija en el estigma de tu cuello.{/n}
languages.original_text: "May He guard our hearts against foul passions and weakness of spirit..." {n}Argenta whispers to herself, her eyes locked on the mark on your neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Que Él proteja nuestros corazones de las pasiones abyectas y la debilidad de espíritu...». {n}Argenta susurra para sus adentros con la mirada fija en el estigma de tu cuello.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「主よ、汚れた情熱や精神の弱みから我々の心をお守りください…」{n}アルジェンタは呟くように囁く。その目はこちらの首に刻まれた印をジッと見ている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "May He guard our hearts against foul passions and weakness of spirit..." {n}Argenta whispers to herself, her eyes locked on the mark on your neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「主よ、汚れた情熱や精神の弱みから我々の心をお守りください…」{n}アルジェンタは呟くように囁く。その目はこちらの首に刻まれた印をジッと見ている。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “愿祂保护我们的内心，让我们远离邪恶的激情与精神上的软弱……”{n}阿洁塔低声说道，她的眼睛紧紧盯着你脖子上的烙印。{/n}
languages.original_text: "May He guard our hearts against foul passions and weakness of spirit..." {n}Argenta whispers to herself, her eyes locked on the mark on your neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “愿祂保护我们的内心，让我们远离邪恶的激情与精神上的软弱……”{n}阿洁塔低声说道，她的眼睛紧紧盯着你脖子上的烙印。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Puisse-t-Il garder nos cœurs contre les passions mauvaises et les faiblesses de l'âme... » {n}murmure Argenta sans quitter des yeux la marque sur votre cou.{/n}
languages.original_text: "May He guard our hearts against foul passions and weakness of spirit..." {n}Argenta whispers to herself, her eyes locked on the mark on your neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Puisse-t-Il garder nos cœurs contre les passions mauvaises et les faiblesses de l'âme... » {n}murmure Argenta sans quitter des yeux la marque sur votre cou.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Möge er unsere Herzen vor schändlichen Leidenschaften und Willensschwäche beschützen ..." {n}Argenta spricht im Flüsterton mit sich selbst. Ihre Augen sind auf das Mal an deinem Hals fixiert.{/n}
languages.original_text: "May He guard our hearts against foul passions and weakness of spirit..." {n}Argenta whispers to herself, her eyes locked on the mark on your neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Möge er unsere Herzen vor schändlichen Leidenschaften und Willensschwäche beschützen ..." {n}Argenta spricht im Flüsterton mit sich selbst. Ihre Augen sind auf das Mal an deinem Hals fixiert.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "May He guard our hearts against foul passions and weakness of spirit..." {n}Argenta whispers to herself, her eyes locked on the mark on your neck.{/n}

languages.text: "Kirli arzulardan ve nefsin âcizliğinden O'na sığınırız..." {n}Argenta kendi kendine fısıldıyor, gözleriyse boğazındaki ize kenetlenmiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: "May He guard our hearts against foul passions and weakness of spirit..." {n}Argenta whispers to herself, her eyes locked on the mark on your neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kirli arzulardan ve nefsin acizliğinden O'na sığınırız..." {n}diye kendi kendine fısıldıyor Argenta, gözleriyse boğazındaki ize kenetlenmiş.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
